definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: Who would you like to contact?
Nice to meet you. Where do you come from?
Could you tell me when we get there ?
sentences.chinese: 敬辭幾點能夠達到那裏。

sentences.english: Have you sent that order yet?
sentences.chinese: 敬辭你將訂單發送了嗎？

sentences.english: Please" is only a honorific. It has no real meaning and doesn' t form the concurrent structure."
sentences.chinese: “請”不表示實在意義，是敬辭，不構成兼語結構。

sentences.english: Would you like a single room or a double room?
sentences.chinese: 敬辭你想訂單人世還是雙人世？
